Yamaha Pusing Tentukan Rider, Valentino Rossi Dijamin Dapat Tempat
05 Nov 2019, 11:38 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Dari empat rider Yamaha di MotoGP, tampaknya yang tak perlu pusing hanya Franco Morbidelli. Selama mampu tampil baik, ia bakal aman-aman saja dipertahankan di Petronas Yamaha SRT pada 2021. Yang jadi pembicaraan panas justru tiga rider lainnya, yakni Valentino Rossi, Maverick Vinales, dan Fabio Quartararo.
Bukan rahasia lagi mereka sedang berebut tempat di tim pabrikan. Keputusan paling krusial ada di tangan Rossi. Pensiun atau tidak, dialah yang paling menentukan kombinasi pebalap tim tersebut pada 2021. Hal ini pun ditegaskan oleh Managing Director Yamaha Motor Racing, Lin Jarvis.
Jarvis menyatakan satu kursi di tim pabrikan dipastikan tersedia untuk The Doctor jika rider Italia itu memutuskan melanjutkan karier pada 2021 mendatang. "Itu sudah jelas," ungkap Jarvis dalam wawancaranya dengan La Gazzetta dello Sport pasca MotoGP Malaysia di Sepang akhir pekan lalu.

Dizzy Yamaha Determine Rider, Valentino Rossi Guaranteed To Place
05 Nov 2019, 11:38 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Of the four Yamaha riders in MotoGP, it seems that there is no need to bother just Franco Morbidelli. As long as it is able to perform well, it will be safe to be defended at the Yamaha SRT Petronas in 2021. The hot talk is precisely the other three riders, namely Valentino Rossi, Maverick Vinales, and Fabio Quartararo.
It's no secret they are fighting for a place on the manufacturer's team. The most crucial decision is in the hands of Rossi. Retiring or not, he was the one who determined the combination of the team racer in 2021. This was confirmed by Yamaha Motor Racing Managing Director, Lin Jarvis.
Jarvis said a seat on the manufacturer's team would certainly be available for The Doctor if the Italian rider decided to continue his career in 2021. "That is clear," Jarvis said in his interview with La Gazzetta dello Sport after the Malaysian MotoGP in Sepang last weekend.
